projects.title: EAKTR
projects.descr:
This portfolio has been crafted for Elias Akentour, an experienced web designer. It mainly relies on the use of Pixi.js.
One of my first steps into the world of 2D WebGL.

projects.title: BMW Motorshow
projects.descr:
360 WebGL immersive experience letting the user dive into the BMW booth at the Paris Motorshow.
In charge of the full desktop website, I used Three.js for the 360 views and the 3D map.
projects.awards: 1 x SOTD FWA, 1 x SOTD AWWWARDS

projects.title: Nokia Health
projects.descr: Website for Nokia Health users to show their data during the past year. I used canvas for the animations.

projects.title: The Forest
projects.descr:
My first Three.js and VR project. A scary 360 experiment in virtual reality built for the promotionnal campaign of the movie The Forest.
I worked on the VR mobile part of the website.
projects.awards: 1 x SOTD FWA, 1 x SOTD FWA Mobile

projects.title: 2D wave generator
projects.descr: Small canvas experiment creating and animate 2D waves.

projects.title: Video alpha mask
projects.descr: Mask applied on text using a video alpha in canvas.
